Class Item

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Entity
Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boulder, Gem, Key
public class Item extends Entity
The Item class represents an entity that can fall and roll in the game. It extends the Entity class and provides functionality for falling, rolling, and handling collisions with various other game objects.
Version:
1.0.3
Author:
Oscar Baggs

  • Field Details

    • isFalling

      protected boolean isFalling

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String pathToSprite, GridPosition position)
      Creates an Item object with the specified sprite path and position.
      Parameters:
      pathToSprite - the path to the sprite image for the item
      position - the position of the item in the game world

  • Method Details

    • fall

      public boolean fall(Map map)
      Makes the item fall down the map, interacting with the game objects it encounters. The item falls until it hits a solid object or reaches the bottom of the map. If the item falls onto a player, enemy, butterfly, or water, special interactions occur.
      Parameters:
      map - the map on which the item is falling
      Returns:
      true if the item successfully falls, false otherwise

    • roll

      public void roll(Map map)
      Makes the item roll in the game world, interacting with the environment based on the neighboring game objects. The item rolls left or right if there is a valid path.
      Parameters:
      map - the map where the item is rolling

    • update

      public void update(Map map)
      Updates the item. In this class, no update behavior is defined.
      Specified by:
      update in class GameObject
      Parameters:
      map - the map on which to update the item

    • move

      public void move(Map map, Direction dir)
      Moves the item in the specified direction on the map. The movement is restricted to UP, DOWN, LEFT, or RIGHT directions.
      Specified by:
      move in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map - the map on which the item is moving
      dir - the direction in which to move the item

    • collisionCheck

      public boolean collisionCheck(Map map, GridPosition position)
      Performs a collision check for the item at the specified position on the map.
      Specified by:
      collisionCheck in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map - the map to check for collisions
      position - the position to check for collisions
      Returns:
      false as collisions are not handled in this method

    • collisionCheck

      public boolean collisionCheck(Map map, Direction dir)
      Performs a collision check for the item in the specified direction.
      Specified by:
      collisionCheck in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map - the map to check for collisions
      dir - the direction to check for collisions
      Returns:
      false as collisions are not handled in this method
